prompt: Develop a vibrant photo gallery viewer with a colorful tropical theme. The main image, featuring a beach sunset, should span the top with 12px rounded corners and a warm orange shadow (opacity 0.15, blur 6px). Include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 7 images (80x80px, 10px corners, 10px spacing) in a bright yellow container (#FFFF8D). Place three action buttons vertically on the right side of the screen in a column: a pink heart icon (#F06292), a teal share icon (#26A69A), and a purple download icon (#AB47BC), each in a rounded square container with 14px padding and a light coral background (#FFCDD2). Use a light cream scaffold background (#FFF8E1) with 18px padding. The app bar should have a gradient background (from #FFCA28 to #F57C00), a black back arrow, and a title 'Tropical Gallery' in white bold text. Ensure the design feels lively and cohesive with balanced spacing.
